name: behave-vsc

behave-vsc.envVarList.description:
Optional SINGLE-quoted csv list of environment variables to use when calling a behave command
Example 'var1':'val1','var2':'val2'

behave-vsc.fastSkipList.description:
Optional unquoted csv list of fast skip tags, example: @skip, @skip-me-too.
This will stop behave being called for those tags. Use if you have a lot of tests to skip.
This setting has no effect when you run all tests at once and 'Run All As One' is enabled.

behave-vsc.runAllAsOne.description:
When running all tests, use a single 'python -m behave'.
Recommended to leave this on, unless you can enable 'Run Parallel'.

behave-vsc.runParallel.description:
Run behave tests in fast async mode.
Leave this off for your initial run, then enable if your test setup supports it (i.e. your tests are fully isolated).
This setting has no effect when you run all tests at once and 'Run All As One' is enabled.

description: Debug/Run Behave tests from Sidebar or Feature file

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
